content: Website | Twitter | Discord | Telegram | Github | Wallets | Explorer | » Price is calculated with several factors:• Demand market for good POW coin• Speed of our chain (which is bigger than most other Ethereum forks)• Presence of software for mining Ethash algorithm• Quality of project (crew experience, legal company presence, other chained projects with AVES)• Block reward which is 3 AVS per block (and 5% going to Eco funds, that mean block reward is 2.85 AVES)• Also if the price is under a minimum of 2 dollars there will not be any earnings for miners
